title: These are good
body: Great quality. Nice to use and I would honestly say that they are about 95% "nonstick." Either way, I'd definitely buy these again!

title: Carote
body: These are the best pots and skillets I have ever had. So easy to clean. No sticking of food. This will always be my go to for pots and pans.

title: Awesome customer service
body: I really do like these pants. I'm hoping that they will last a while. Customer service gets five stars also. One of my pans arrived with a broken handle. Emailed customer service and I had a new one on the way.

title: It is AMAZINGLY & unbelievably really & truly nonstick cookware!
body: My daughter bought me the Carote cookware set & I added these 1.5 & 3 qt pots because I love cooking with Carote so much that I wanted a complete set. This cookware is pretty & the porcelain is still smooth & clean after 6 months of use. No pits or cracks! The pans are solid & durable with pretty glass lids. I was a little unsure of the wooden handles but they are great; waterproof & I’ve used them in the oven for short periods of time. But here is the BEST part, it REALLY is nonstick! Cleanup is a breeze because nothing sticks. Nothing! It’s amazing. I’m an avid cook & have been serving up meals almost nightly for 40 years & I have never loved a cookware set like I love this. I use the 10” skillet almost daily for high temp frying & sautéing & though the bottom porcelain has darkened some, it is still solid & completely non stick. Highly recommend!!!

title: Pleasantly surprised by these pans
body: I was concerned using a white pan might be risky but the price was right so I tried them. Since then I have seen them used on cooking videos. They work fine and no stains so far. I wash in the dishwasher and they look new every time. I’m very impressed with this brand. The handles say they are Bakelite and feel cool when cooking.

title: Peeling within 4 months
body: I will say I've used this quite a bit but I ordered it mid August and it's already peeling so I can't use it anymore ...

title: Discount on product
body: Product came in an open box- appears that it may have been used. Scratched and dirty

title: Great quality and customer service!
body: Love these pots and the Carote brand!

title: Very high-quality for the money and no internal rivets on the inside of the pan!
body: I absolutely love these pots and pans. That nonstick works very well and the fit and finish feel like they should cost five $600. The wooden handles are solid wood and polished perfectly. The best thing I like is they have poor spouts so you can use the lid to drain pasta and it makes it easy to pour leftovers into a bowl. Also no internal rivets.. I liked him so much. I bought a complete set.

title: Very pleased with this produce and have recommended to other family members & friends
body: Enjoy the produce
